mapper.insert: insert into userinfo (user_id, user_pw, user_address, user_birthday, user_name, user_nick, join_date) values (#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_address}, #{user_birthday}, #{user_name}, #{user_nick}, now())
mapper.select: select * from userinfo where user_id = #{user_id} and user_pw = #{user_pw}
